languages.text: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.
languages.original_text: Получая {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}, псайкер также получает {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} в объеме, равном половине полученного моментума. Временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, полученное таким способом, не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Psyker gains momentum, the Psyker also gains temporary wounds equal to the half of gained momentum. Temporary wounds gained from this effect do not stack.
Whenever the psyker gains momentum, the psyker also gains temporary wounds equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary wounds gained from this effect do not stack.

Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.

Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.

languages.text: Получая {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}моментум{/g}, псайкер также получает {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временное здоровье{/g} в объеме, равном половине полученного моментума. Временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, полученное таким способом, не суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Получая моментум, псайкер также получает временное здоровье в объеме, равном половине полученного моментума. Временное здоровье, полученное таким способом, не суммируется.
Получая моментум, псайкер также получает временное здоровье в объеме, равном половине полученного моментума. Временное здоровье, полученное таким способом, не суммируется.

languages.text: 每当灵能者获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}时，也同样会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，数值相当于获得士气的一半。此效果获得的临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}不会叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.

traits.locale_text: 每当灵能者获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}士气{/g}时，也同样会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，数值相当于获得士气的一半。此效果获得的临时生命值不会叠加。
每当灵能者获得{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}士气{/g}时，也同样会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，数值相当于获得士气的一半。此效果获得的临时生命值不会叠加。

languages.text: Cada vez que el psíquico gane {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}ímpetu{/g}, también gana tantas {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} como la mitad del ímpetu obtenido. Las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales otorgadas por este efecto no son acumulativas.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el psíquico gane {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}ímpetu{/g}, también gana tantas {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} como la mitad del ímpetu obtenido. Las heridas temporales otorgadas por este efecto no son acumulativas.

languages.text: Wenn der Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}Dynamik{/g} erlangt, erhält er auch {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}, die der Hälfte der erlangten Dynamik entsprechen. Über diesen Effekt erlangte vorübergehende {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} werden nicht gestapelt.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Wann immer der Psioniker {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}Dynamik{/g} erlangt, erhält er auch {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}, die der Hälfte der erlangten Dynamik entsprechen. Über diesen Effekt erlangte vorübergehende Wunden werden nicht gestapelt.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le psyker acquiert de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}fougue{/g}, il reçoit également un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à la moitié de la fougue acquise. Les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires liées à cet effet ne sont pas cumulables.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le psyker acquiert de la {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}fougue{/g}, il reçoit également un nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} égal à la moitié de la fougue acquise. Les blessures temporaires liées à cet effet ne sont pas cumulables.

languages.text: 異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得た時、獲得した推進力の半分に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。この効果によって得た一時体力は累積しない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary wounds gained from this effect do not stack.

traits.locale_text: 異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetails}推進力{/g}を得た時、獲得した推進力の半分に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。この効果によって得た一時体力は累積しない。
異能者が{g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}推進力{/g}を得た時、獲得した推進力の半分に等しい{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}を得る。この効果によって得た一時体力は累積しない。

languages.text: Ruhsezer, her {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g} kazandığında kazanılan momentumun yarısı kadar {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanı kazanır. Bu etkiden kazanılan geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanları üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: Whenever the psyker gains {g|Encyclopedia:MomentumWithDetailsGlossary}momentum{/g}, the psyker also gains {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g} equal to the half of the gained momentum. Temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} gained from this effect do not stack.
